data.question: What is the highest BET surface area reported among the PCN-224 series?
Does PCN-224(Co) show high efficiency as a heterogeneous catalyst for the CO2 and epoxide coupling reaction?
What is the chemical stability range of pH for PCN-224 series in aqueous solution?
Is the PCN-224 series constructed with a Zr6 cluster?
What is the symmetry of the Zr6 cluster in PCN-224?
Can PCN-224(Co) be used as a recoverable heterogeneous catalyst?
What strategy was used to construct the ultrastable porphyrin Zr metal-organic frameworks?
Does PCN-224 retain good crystallinity after being soaked in various pH solutions?
What is the role of the Zr6 cluster in the stability of PCN-224?
data.answer: The strong interaction between Zr(IV) and carboxylate contributes to the chemical stability of the MOFs.

data.question: What is the role of hydroxyl groups in the Zr6 cluster of PCN-222?
data.answer: The introduction of OH groups improves the hardness of the Zr6 core, which strengthens the bonding between the bridging ligands and the Zr6 units.

data.question: Is the solvent-accessible volume in PCN-224 higher than 75%?
What is the significance of the D3d symmetry in the Zr6 cluster for PCN-224?
data.answer: It allows the construction of new porphyrinic zirconium MOFs with high stability and unexplored catalytic activity.

data.question: What is the yield of PCN-224(no metal) synthesis?
Does the PCN-224 series exhibit the highest BET surface area among all reported porphyrinic MOFs?
What is the role of benzoic acid in the synthesis of PCN-224?
data.answer: Benzoic acid acts as a modulating agent to adjust the reaction conditions and facilitate the formation of the desired MOF structure.

data.question: What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of PCN-224?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent to dissolve the starting materials for the MOF synthesis.

data.question: Can PCN-224 series MOFs be activated by drying under vacuum?
What is the significance of the 3-D channels in PCN-224 for catalysis?
data.answer: The 3-D channels allow fast diffusion and transportation of substrates and products, improving catalytic efficiency.

data.question: What is the role of tetrabutylammonium chloride in the CO2/propylene oxide coupling reaction catalyzed by PCN-224(Co)?
data.answer: Tetrabutylammonium chloride acts as a cocatalyst to enhance the reaction efficiency.

data.question: Does the PCN-224 series demonstrate good recyclability as a catalyst?
